reviewText: This was exactly what my granddaughter wanted and I was not able to find it in our local retail stores.  The service was great and I was pleased with the delivery time.  I received it in plently of time for her Christmas gift.  I will do business with this retailer again. RVT. in Michigan
Tom and Jerry Tales Volume 3 is the third volume and has even more Tom and Jerry cartoons on it. I look forward to each volume. Cant wait for volume 4.

This was exactly what my granddaughter wanted and I was not able to find it in our local retail stores.  The service was great and I was pleased with the delivery time.  I received it in plently of time for her Christmas gift.  I will do business with this retailer again. RVT. in Michigan
Tom and Jerry Tales Volume 3 is the third volume and has even more Tom and Jerry cartoons on it. I look forward to each volume. Cant wait for volume 4.
I'm so happy to find a classic cartoon to share with my little boy. He loves 'Thomas' & Jerry as he puts it. This DVD is a good run time & will keep you laughing.
Grandkids love it. I used to watch these when I was a kid.  DVD good quality.  Nice cartoon series that still is televised.

I always love the way Tom (The Cat) chase Jerry (The Mouse) in the movie. Every tv show when the show appears 'Tom and Jerry' we (ray, junior my brother and their kids ) loves watching  cartoons. We never stop watching the show. I even order a dvd of Tom and Jerry  for my kids because they loved it. I want 2 rate this movie of 5 stars !!

My daughter has loved Tom and Jerry, so I bought this for her as a surprise while I was out-of-town.  Well, she couldn't watch much of it.  It was too scary for her.  VERY disappointed to have wasted money on this one.

I don't know why but my 3 year old loves Tom and Jerry.  Their DVDs can do no wrong.  This one is a collection of cartoons that play through the menu or via item selection.  It allows skipping trailers.

Some Tom and Jerry DVDs have the a Tom and Jerry cartoon intro for EACH cartoon that is extremely annoying.  This is not one of them.
My 9yr old daughter and I love Tom and Jerry and the whole collection is great!
I purchsed this for my son & he loves it, it was a great price & shipped fast. Good length of time on the DVD also.
